p: Previous studies have shown that C. elegans can be used for toxicity assessment of metal [ 35], organic contaminants [ 36], pharmaceutical compounds [ 37] or specific components extracted from plants [ 38]. In the present study, our data further suggests that C. elegans can be utilized to toxicity assessment of Chinese medicinal materials. Therefore, C. elegans can be used to estimate the beneficial effects and adverse reactions of Chinese medicinal materials. We first evaluated the toxicity of PHS using C. elegans. Since most Chinese medicinal materials still lack detailed toxicity data, C. elegans will be a fast and systematic system for assessing the toxicity of Chinese medicinal materials.
